name: peanech-erp-system
description: Peanech ERP - Complete Enterprise Resource Planning System

scripts.prestart: where php >nul 2>&1 || echo Warning: PHP not in PATH. Use 'npm run laragon:start' on Windows with Laragon.
scripts.dev: echo 'Starting development server...' && concurrently "npm run start" "echo Run watch-css.ps1 in another terminal" --names "SERVER,CSS" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.dev:laragon: echo 'Starting Laragon development server...' && concurrently "npm run laragon:start" "echo Run watch-css.ps1 in another terminal" --names "SERVER,CSS" --prefix-colors "blue,green"

author: Peanech Team
